nodes.text: Quellor was a terrestrial astronomical object located in the Quellor sector of the galaxy's Colonies region. It was situated along the Quellor Run, running to the planet Commenor. Quellor was the homeworld of a TIE pilot of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, whose family waved an Imperial flag from their apartment. However, it was taken by the New Republic by 5 ABY. While speaking to the New Republic Starfighter Commander Wyl Lark, the 204th pilot cited the capture as the reason the Imperial could not go home.
